channel.title: [508] help
channel.description: Ok, i have a 508 mithscape private server source. I code and host it for a couple of my friends that help me code. When we try to do things like every 30 mins it disconnects and the cmd prompts just keeps saying connection recived from ip .... and wont let us back in, intail i restart the server. How can we fix this?

item.title: [508] help
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

Thats what i am doing currently, but i would let to get rid of the disconnects completly but idk if i can or not.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] help
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

You could try add an server-restarter that restarts the server every 30 minutes.

Read full topic
